channel.title: Locale on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Locale on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Locale
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale Service Datatype Description Methods getClosestToLanguageTag Get the closest locale for the language tag (ISO 639-1 & 3166-1) format. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Locale record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Locale_Country
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country Service Datatype Description This service provides methods to retrieve country locale information. Methods getAllVatCountryCodesAndVatIdRegexes getAvailableCountries getCountries getCountriesAndStates getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Locale_Country record. getStates Retrieve states that belong to this country. isEuropeanUnionCountry

item.title: SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone Service Datatype Description Each User is assigned a timezone allowing for a precise local timestamp. Methods getAllObjects Retrieve all timezone objects. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Locale
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale Service Datatype Description Local friendlyName Type: string id Internal identification number of a locale Type: integer languageTag Type: string name Locale name Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Locale_Country
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country Service Datatype Description Local isEuropeanUnionFlag Binary flag denoting if this country is part of the European Union Type: integer isoCodeAlphaThree Type: string longName Type: string postalCodeFormat Type: string postalCodeRequiredFlag Type: integer shortName Type: string vatIdRegex Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Locale_StateProvince
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_StateProvince Datatype Description This object represents a state or province for a country. Local longName Type: string shortName Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone Service Datatype Description Each User is assigned a timezone allowing for a precise local timestamp. associatedMethods SoftLayer_User_Customer::getTimezone seeAlso SoftLayer_User_Customer Local id A timezone's identifying number. Type: integer longName A timezone's long name. For example, "(GMT-06:00) America/Dallas - CST". Type: string name A timezone's name. For example, "America/Dallas". Type: string

item.title: getAllObjects
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone::getAllObjects Retrieve all timezone objects. Overview Retrieve all timezone objects. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Locale_TimezoneObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone[]

item.title: getAllVatCountryCodesAndVatIdRegexes
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getAllVatCountryCodesAndVatIdRegexes Overview This method is to get the collection of VAT country codes and VAT ID Regexes. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Return Values SoftLayer_Container_Collection_Locale_VatCountryCodeAndFormat[]

item.title: getAvailableCountries
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getAvailableCountries Overview Use this method to retrieve a list of countries and locale information available to the current user. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale_Country[]

item.title: getClosestToLanguageTag
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale::getClosestToLanguageTag Get the closest locale for the language tag (ISO 639-1 & 3166-1) format. Overview Parameters Name Type Description languageTag string Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_LocaleObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale

item.title: getCountries
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getCountries Overview Use this method to retrieve a list of countries and locale information such as country code and state/provinces. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale_Country[]

item.title: getCountriesAndStates
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getCountriesAndStates Overview Parameters Name Type Description usFirstFlag boolean Required Headers authenticate Return Values SoftLayer_Container_Collection_Locale_CountryCode[]

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale::getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Locale record. Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_LocaleInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_LocaleObjectMask SoftLayer_LocaleObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Locale_Country record. Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectMask SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale_Country

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone::getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone record. Overview getObject retrieves the SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone object whose ID number corresponds to the ID number of the init parameter passed to the SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone service. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Locale_TimezoneInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Locale_TimezoneObjectMask SoftLayer_Locale_TimezoneObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale_Timezone

item.title: getStates
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getStates Retrieve states that belong to this country. Overview Retrieve states that belong to this country. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectMask SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale_StateProvince[]

item.title: isEuropeanUnionCountry
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::isEuropeanUnionCountry Overview Parameters Name Type Description iso2CountryCode string Two-letter country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) Required Headers authenticate Return Values boolean
